EventStory.Headline: Edited Transcript of APHA.TO M&A conference call or presentation 16-Dec-20 1:30pm GMT
EventStory.Body:
Aphria Inc and Tilray Inc Combine to Create Largest Global Cannabis Company
LEAMINGTON Dec 16, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of Aphria Inc M&A conference call or presentation Wednesday, December 16, 2020 at 1:30:00pm GMT
TEXT version of Transcript

Event.eventTitle: Aphria Inc and Tilray Inc Combine to Create Largest Global Cannabis Company
